name: DashFun Coin
description: Dashfun is a Telegram MiniApp-based Web3 Gaming Platform, with future expansion to Line, Kakao, and more. DashFun aims to address these challenges by building a truly playable, sustainable, and profitable Web3 gaming ecosystem. Our goal is to create an AI-powered gaming platform that combines the strengths of both Web2 and Web3, allowing users worldwide to seamlessly engage with decentralized gaming experiences while offering innovative economic models that support both content creators and investors.
